column3: and it delivered! Top 2 of the best briskets I ever had. Melt in the mouth meat. Sausage had a good kick
column4: and I got the medium hot. Good atmosphere too. Very Texas. We drove from close to IAH airport all the way down (since it was open until 9pm)
column5: and it was very worth the drive. My recommendation is the end of the brisket and the ribs. You're welcome.
